programme.title: College Football 150: The Greatest
programme.desc: In college football, mascots are an unlikely piece of serious business. These are the Top 11 live animals, cartoon creations, and everything in between, in a fun breakdown of one of the sport's most enjoyable traditions.(n)

programme.title: College Football 150: The American Game
programme.desc: College football is more than just a sport -- it's a cultural phenomenon. To understand the game, you have to understand how much everything around it matters too -- from the team colors to the uniforms to the bands, the mascots and more.(n)

programme.title: College Football 150: The American Game
programme.desc: This documentary series is a definitive look at the history of college football as both a sport and a cultural phenomenon.(n)

programme.title: College Football 150: The American Game
programme.desc: College football has evolved in so many transformative ways. All throughout its history, the sport's constant evolutions have had common threads, with officials and coaches striving to make it safer, more exciting, and more entertaining.(n)

programme.title: College Football 150: The Greatest
programme.desc: If the best parts of sports are how they can inspire people, college football has enjoyed a wealth of unforgettable moments that fans will cherish forever. These are the Top 11 of those highlights, on the field and off.(n)

programme.title: College Football 150: The Greatest
programme.desc: College football has continually evolved and innovated in ways that have made the game safer, more entertaining, and more exciting. These are the Top 11 innovations that have impacted the sport's history.(n)

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Bears begin their season against the Jayhawks. Baylor return to its winning ways in 2019, going 11-3 after falling to Georgia in the Sugar Bowl. Bears coach Dave Aranda steps in for Matt Rhule, who left to become coach of the Carolina Panthers.(n)

programme.title: College Football 150 - Football Is US: The College Game
programme.desc: Features several of the sport's major stars, past and present, including NCAA record-setting wide receiver Jerry Rice, national championship-winning head coaches Barry Switzer and Nick Saban, Heisman Trophy winner Andre Ware and many more.(n)

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The game comes down to a final kick and once again Florida State's hopes for a national championship went wide right. Dan Mowrey's missed 39-yard field goal attempt on the final play of the game results in a Miami 19-16 victory. From Oct. 3, 1992.(n)
